feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA2/RBX7/RBX8/LIM1][Dedicated Servers] - Multiple racks maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 10, 2026, 01:00 - 05:00 UTC

Nov 27, 02:36 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer, affecting servers in racks R715A10,L115A18,R714B05,R717A19,R713B08,R717B20,R719A20,R717A07,R804L02 and G243A06.

Start time : 10/02/2026 01:00 UTC
End time : 10/02/2026 05:00 UTC
Service impact : vRack network will be temporarily unavailable up to 1 hour during the maintenance for servers in the specified racks.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - Racks 31A19/31A20/31A21 maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 16, 21:00 UTC  -  Dec 17, 06:00 UTC

Nov 5, 13:13 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer.

Start time : 16/12/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 17/12/2025 06:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the specified racks will be temporarily unavailable up to 9 hours during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be moving servers in the specified racks from RBX2 to RBX7.

Thank you for your understanding.
